string-array.name: description
string-array.item: The number of hours of healthy sleep is 7 to 9 hours a day
The daily need for water is 2 to 3 liters
The normal range of calories for adults is 1,600 to 3,000 calories per day The food should contain vegetables, starches and proteins, and keep the main meals regularly,especially breakfast.
The normal rate of playing sports per day is from 40 to 90 minutes per day, and it should be two free days without sports
The normal heart rate for adults is between 60 and 100 beats per minute
The normal rate of breathing in a healthy adult at rest is between 12 to 16 breaths per minute
The normal range for a healthy adult at rest is 120/80 mm Hg
The normal body temperature for a healthy adult is between 36.6 and 37.2Â°C.
You must stop smoking because it causes many diseases such as heart diseases, strokes and pulmonary diseases
In general, you should follow the advice to live a healthy life, and you should check your vital signs to check on your health
